title: ICE: debuginfo: Trying to create type name for unexpected type

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust [project.tar.gz](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/11782528/project.tar.gz) ``` ### Meta `rustc +nightly --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.72.0-nightly (3b2073f07 2023-06-17) binary: rustc commit-hash: 3b2073f0762cff4d3d625bb10017e0ce4e7abe50 commit-date: 2023-06-17 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.72.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.5 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/debuginfo/type_names.rs:426:13: debuginfo: Trying to create type name for unexpected type: app::__rtic_internal_ledtask_F thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/3b2073f0762cff4d3d625bb10017e0ce4e7abe50/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1650:9 ```
Backtrace
